conducted using.from sentence: All experiments are conducted using a GeForce GTX 1080 GPU with 8GB memory.

initialize.from sentence: We initialise word embeddings using GloVe (Pennington et al., 2014) 300 dimensional embeddings.

dropout.from sentence: Dropout (Srivastava et al., 2014) is applied to embedding hidden states, with a rate of 0.5.

Adam optimizer (Kingma and Ba, 2014).from sentence: All models are optimised using the Adam optimizer (Kingma and Ba, 2014), with an initial learning rate of 0.001 and a decay rate of 0.97.

gradients.from sentence: Gradients are clipped at 3 and a batch size of 10 is adopted

batch size.from sentence: Gradients are clipped at 3 and a batch size of 10 is adopted.

L2 regularization parameter.from sentence: The L2 regularization parameter is set to 0.001.
